dict.acceptation: 发现物；研究结果；调查（或研究）的结果；<律>（陪审团的）裁决；

sent.orig: This is like finding fault finding fault on the age.
sent.trans: 这是个想找茬就找茬的年代。

sent.orig: Finding the right job is as subjective as finding the right spouse.
sent.trans: 找合适的工作与找合适的配偶一样全凭主观。

sent.orig: But, finding bugs, even finding them early, isn't enough.
sent.trans: 但是，发现bug,甚至尽早的发现bug,仍然是不够的。

sent.orig: ZU: Finding an alien is much easier than finding a good drummer in Beijing.
sent.trans: 在北京找一个外星人可能比找一个鼓手要容易。

sent.orig: Finding planets is proving hard enough, but finding life on them will prove infinitely more difficult.
sent.trans: 寻找行星证明相当困难，但是要在行星上发现生命会变得无比艰难。
